title: Adults-Only Country Escape near Queenstown with Daily Breakfast
description:
Holidays don't get much better than a stay in one of New Zealandâ€™s most picturesque towns at Arrowtown House Boutique Hotel.

Established in 1862 during the height of the Otago gold rush, Arrowtown is a must-visit spot for gourmands and lovers of history, architecture, and nature. Settle into the stylish and serene spaces that authentically reflect the heritage of Arrowtown, with modern touches to propel it into a memorable stay, and just five uniquely designed rooms ensuring complete tranquility. By day, wander past the restored cottages around town to learn the many stories this area has to tell, hit the hiking or cycling trails, or make your way to Queenstown (a 20-minute drive away) for a dose of adventure, then head back to your home away from home and curl up with a glass of local wine soaking up the serene atmosphere.
